text: Excellent !! De tres bons cafes et gateaux, le tout sans-gluten et vegetalien. Le tout dans une atmosphere tres calme. Tres bonne musique. On voit bien que la proprietaire adore son cafe et cherche a donner la meilleure experience possible a ses clients. Ce cafe est une veritable perle !!

Cet endroit a beaucoup de charme. Les boissons et les petites pâtisseries sont délicieuses. J'ai commandé un brownie sans gluten et un latté. La propriétaire est très accueillante et elle a bavardé avec nous. La décoration intérieure a beaucoup de goût et j'apprécie beaucoup tous les papiers peints. Les vêtements ont un prix abordable et j'aime la sélection. Je reviendrai :)

I pass by daily in front of this little shop but was never inclined to walk in mostly cause I was always in a hurry to get to or from home. Until luck had it, on a sunny Saturday afternoon, I was asked to wait for my dogs vet prescription to be filled so I figured I'd grab a coffee at this shop a few doors down. Walking in, I immediately fell in love with the quaint space, cute white chairs and homey feel of this little cafe. As if this wasn't enough, there were rows of secondhand clothing, shoes, books, jewellery and even beauty products to peruse over. 

Ordered my coffee and sat on the outdoor patio; coffee was great and they offer both almond or coconut milk! The owner of the shop also serves behind the counter and we chatted about her shop and offerings. Not only is there a full vegan menu but they even have crudessence products for you to eat in or take out. I also found out that they even offer different ateliers, like jewellery making! 

This shop is not only a great addition to the neighbourhood but offers products and service that anyone can appreciate with a super friendly and personalized service. Will definitely be stopping in more often!
Enterprise familiale. Tres joli café, decor d'antan , en face du parc, tres propre, service personalisé et attentioné, repas sans glouten savoureux. Aussi friperie de selection sur place.
